Package model

Class ClinicHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ClinicHistory
  • public class ClinicHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the information of the clinic history of a pet

      Description This method allows to add new medicines that were prescription during the hospitalization at the patient stories.

      post: New medicines were added to the patient clinic story.

      Description This method allows to add new notes to the possible diagnostic during the hospitalization at the patient stories.
      pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
      post: New notes were added to the possible diagnostic in the patient clinic story.

      Description This method allows to add a new symptom presented during the hospitalization at the patient stories.
      pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
      post: A new symptom were added to the patient clinic story.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClinicHistory

        public ClinicHistory​(boolean status,
                     java.lang.String symptoms,
                     java.lang.String diagnostic,
                     Animal data,
                     Date joinDate,
                     Date exitDate)
        ClinicHistory constructor
        Parameters:
        status - the status of the history. this param must be not null.
        symptoms - the symptomsof the pet. this param must be not null.
        diagnostic - the diagnostic of the pet. this param must be not null.
        data - the pet. this param must be not null.
        joinDate - the hospitalized day . this param must be not null.
        exitDate - the discharge date. this param could be null.

      • addMedicines

        public java.lang.String addMedicines​(java.lang.String name,
                                     double dose,
                                     double costDose,
                                     double frequency)
        Description This method allows to add new medicines that were prescription during the hospitalization at the patient stories.
        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: New medicines were added to the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        name - The medicine name. This param must be not null.
        dose - The medicine dose, this param refers to the amount of medicine supplied to the pet each time according the frequence assigned. This param must be not null.
        costDose - The medicine cost by each dose. This param could be empty.
        frequency - The frequency of medicine application. This param could be empty.
        Returns:
        A message that indiques if medicine was added to the patient clinic story

      • addNotes

        public void addNotes​(java.lang.String diagnostic)
        Description This method allows to add new notes to the possible diagnostic during the hospitalization at the patient stories.
        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: New notes were added to the possible diagnostic in the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        diagnostic - The notes of possible diagnostic. This param must be not null.

      • addSymptoms

        public void addSymptoms​(java.lang.String symptom)
        Description This method allows to add a new symptom presented during the hospitalization at the patient stories.
        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: A new symptom were added to the patient clinic story.
        Parameters:
        symptom - The new symptom presented. This param must be not null.
